feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: third-party development boards in Arduino
entry.content:
A fatal error occurred: Failed to connect to ESP32: No serial data received.

Board Name Selected Board Arduino URL
Arduino Leonardo Arduino Leonardo
Keyestudio ESP32 PLUS Development Board esp32 > ESP32-WROOM-DA Module https://dl.espressif.com/dl/package_esp32_index.json
Adafruit Feather HUZZAH with ESP8266 esp8266 > Adafruit Feather HUZZAH ESP8266 http://arduino.esp8266.com/stable/package_esp8266com_index.json
Seeed Studio XIAO ESP32C3 esp32 > XIAO_ESP32C3 https://files.seeedstudio.com/arduino/package_seeeduino_boards_index.json
Adafruit Feather nRF52 Bluefruit LE Adafruit nRF52 > Adafruit Feather nRF52832 https://adafruit.github.io/arduino-board-index/package_adafruit_index.json
entry.summary: a hassel-free guide for setting up Arduino alternatives
